org.dellroad.stuff.schema

Class SQLCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dellroad.stuff.schema.SQLCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseAction<java.sql.Connection>

    public class SQLCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseAction<java.sql.Connection>
    An SQL DatabaseAction that executes a single SQL statement.

    • Method Detail

      • getSQL

        public java.lang.String getSQL()

      • apply

        public void apply(java.sql.Connection c)
           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Execute the SQL statement.

        The implementation in SQLCommand creates a Statement and then executes the configured SQL command via Statement.execute(java.lang.String). Subclasses may wish to override.

        Specified by:
        apply in interface DatabaseAction<java.sql.Connection>
        Parameters:
        c - open transaction
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an error occurs while accessing the database
